thread.title: Pentagon announces transfer of Guantanamo detainee to Saudi Arabia
thread.title_full: Pentagon announces transfer of Guantanamo detainee to Saudi Arabia

title: Pentagon announces transfer of Guantanamo detainee to Saudi Arabia
text:
23 Pentagon announces transfer of Guantanamo detainee to Saudi Arabia 
Reuters: The United States said on Tuesday it had transferred Abdul Shalabi, a longtime hunger striker at the Guantanamo Bay prison and described as a bodyguard for former al Qaeda leader Osama bin Laden, to his home country of Saudi Arabia.His departure after more than 13-1/2 years at the Guantanamo facility leaves 114 detainees at the U.S. naval base in Cuba, the Pentagon said in a statement.
